key.name: tile-left
key.description: Tile the active window to the left half of the screen

key.name: tile-right
key.description: Tile the active window to the right half of the screen

key.name: tile-top-left
key.description: Tile the active window to the top-left quarter of the screen

key.name: tile-top-right
key.description: Tile the active window to the top-right quarter of the screen

key.name: tile-bottom-left
key.description: Tile the active window to the bottom-left quarter of the screen

key.name: tile-bottom-right
key.description: Tile the active window to the bottom-right quarter of the screen

key.name: swap-left
key.description: Swap the active window with its left neighbor (mosaic or tiling)

key.name: swap-right
key.description: Swap the active window with its right neighbor (mosaic or tiling)

key.name: swap-up
key.description: Swap the active window with its upper neighbor (quarter tiles only)

key.name: swap-down
key.description: Swap the active window with its lower neighbor (quarter tiles only)
